name: Landed Cost Voucher
script:
import frappe

def before_submit(doc, method):
    # Link LCV to Goods Received Notes (GRN)
    for grn in doc.purchase_receipts:
        grn_doc = frappe.get_doc("Purchase Receipt", grn.receipt_document)
        grn_doc.landed_cost_voucher = doc.name
        grn_doc.save()

    # Notify Finance Team
    recipients = ["finance@timaflor.com"]
    message = f"Landed Cost Voucher {doc.name} has been submitted. Total charges: {sum([c.amount for c in doc.applicable_charges])}"
    
    frappe.sendmail(
        recipients=recipients,
        subject="New Landed Cost Voucher Submitted",
        message=message
    )
